languages.en_US:
&aBreaking the chest will delete your unique loot and items! In order to break, &2you must sneak while doing so..
&a As loot is &2per player per chest&a, only break if really needed.
languages.zh_TW:
&a破壞儲物箱會刪除你的獨特戰利品與物品! 如果還是要破壞, &2你必須在這樣做的同時蹲下..
&a 戰利品生成是 &2每個玩家每個儲物箱&a, 只有在真的需要的時候在破壞.

languages.en_US: &cYou dont have permission to break loot chests
languages.zh_TW: &c你沒有權限破壞戰利品儲物箱
